summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3145 for the improvement of Rainier Avenue, from a point one hundred eighty (180) feet south of Barton Street to Fifty-seventh Avenue South; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 38408, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
